titleStmt.title: A dialogue or conference betweene Irenæus and Antimachus, about the rites and ceremonies of the Church of England: by Samuel Gardiner, Doctor of Diuinitie
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, Samuel, b. 1563 or 4.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Braddock [and Valentine Simmes], for Thomas Bushell, and are to be sould at his house, in the Petty Cannons,

notesStmt.note: "Bradock pr[inted]. quires A-D, Simmes the rest"--STC.
Running title reads: Of the rites and ceremonies of the Church of England.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
